projects.title: Projects
projects.yinsh.title: Yinsh Game in Python
projects.yinsh.description: The game offers several modes: play against another player on the same computer, challenge the AI, connect locally via LAN between two PCs, or face opponents online worldwide. Two modes are available — normal or blitz — following classic rules. The user-friendly interface highlights possible moves and details AI actions for better understanding. Graphics and UI were fully custom-made for an optimal experience.
projects.nda.title: Confidential Projet (NDA)
projects.nda.description: Most of our projects (around 90%) are carried out under confidentiality agreements (NDA). Out of respect for our clients, we cannot share details, visuals, or specific examples. These projects span a wide range of fields, including app development, automation, integrations, business tools, and infrastructure optimization.
projects.flutterflow.title: Mobile App Creation Course
projects.flutterflow.description: For several months, I had the pleasure of assisting someone in building their mobile application using Flutter Flow. Together, we explored the fundamentals of mobile development — from mastering the tool to understanding widgets and navigation. I provided guidance through every stage, from screen design to interface optimization, helping create a functional and attractive app while fostering independence.
